name: Homework Simulator EXTREME
description:
How to play: Click on the paper in front of you and solve problems to gain points. However, many annoyance will hinder your progress. Click on these annoyances to momentarily stop them. Don't let the bar on the left side fill up, or else you will lose.

Game was made for Trijam #152 (Theme: Leave me alone!) in 4 hours with an axolotl friend of mine.

Credits:

Music + Voiceover - Axolotl

Tileset - shubibubi - https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-interior

Cabinets - LimeZu - https://limezu.itch.io/kitchen
